title: Hommie
description: We built a platform to help students, professionals, and tourists find verified PGs and rental rooms easily. Property owners can list their spaces, ensuring a safer and smoother process

title: SurgeFlow
description: Developed MERN social media platform, incorporating user authentication and core features such as posts, likes, comments, deletion, and following.

title: Minimalist Cart
description: Implemented a ReactJS shopping cart using Redux Toolkit, integrating Redux Persist to enable data persistence and streamline state management.
